page.title: 13FARMING,HILL FARM
page.content: HILL FARM COVERS 100 ACRES.IT IS A MIXED FARM WITH 100 HEAD OF CATTLE. THE OWNER MR MORRIS GROWS WHEAT BARLEY AND OATS,AND A FEW POTATOES FOR HIS OWN USE.HE ALSO HAS SHEEP DOGS,CALLED HEIDI AND SKIP,HENS FOR EGGS,AND A PONY NAMED PIXIE.THE CATTLE A FRESIAN CROSSED WITH HEREFORD.THEY HAVE 2 COW SHEDS.THERE ARE PEST LIKE RABBITS THAT THEY FERRET OUT.HE USES SOME MACHINERY BUT VERY LITTLE,AND THINKS THE OLD-FASHION WAYS ARE THE BEST, THOUGH HE USES ELECTRIC FENCES TO CONTROL GRAZING.HE HAS BEEN THERE 18 YEARS,ANNUALLY CUTTING THE CORN WITH A SICKLE.HIS DAY STARTS AT 6.30 AM.HE HAS 50 SHEEP TOO. HE HAS ALWAYS FARMED;HE LEARNED TO MILK AT THE AGE OF 5,AND AT THE AGE OF12 COULD DRIVE A TRACTOR.THEY DO NOT LIKE LIVING ON THE MAIN ROAD BECAUSE OF THE HEAVY TRAFFIC.
